mapper.insert: INSERT INTO atch_file ( ATCH_REFER_ID, FILE_ODR, FILE_NM, FILE_PATH, FILE_SZ, FILE_EXTN, REF_TYPE, USE_YN, REG_DT, MDFCN_DT ) VALUES ( #{atchReferId}, #{fileOdr}, #{fileNm}, #{filePath}, #{fileSz}, #{fileExtn}, #{refType}, 'Y', NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID, ATCH_REFER_ID, FILE_ODR, FILE_NM, FILE_PATH, FILE_SZ, FILE_EXTN, REF_TYPE, USE_YN, REG_DT, MDFCN_DT FROM atch_file WHERE ATCH_REFER_ID = #{atchReferId} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY FILE_ODR ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE atch_file SET USE_YN = 'N', /* 논리 삭제 */ MDFCN_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP /* 수정일 갱신 */ WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} /* 첨부파일 ID (PK) */
